# The `MCLineSection` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Instances of this class represent the line information for a compile unit where machine instructions have been assembled after seeing .loc directives. <a href="#details">More...</a>

<CodeBlock>class llvm::MCLineSection</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Instances of this class represent the line information for a compile unit where machine instructions have been assembled after seeing .loc directives.

This is the information used to build the dwarf line table for a section.

Definition at line 233 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcdwarf-h">MCDwarf.h</a>.
